tool_description: An unofficial Destiny 2 API showing all the latest Destiny 2 News
name: Destiny 2 Live
title: Destiny 2 Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News about Destiny 2 from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://destiny-2-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/pcgamer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "destiny-2-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://destiny-2-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "destiny-2-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Destiny 2 News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Destiny 2.
